definition: practicing great self-denial, someone who practices self denial as a spiritual discipline
details:
adjective
- practicing great self-denial
= example: practicing great self-denial
= synonyms: ascetical, austere, spartan
- pertaining to or characteristic of an ascetic or the practice of rigorous self-discipline
= example: pertaining to or characteristic of an ascetic or the practice of rigorous self-discipline
= synonyms: ascetical
noun
- someone who practices self denial as a spiritual discipline
= synonyms: abstainer
